snippet: “Inténtalo” by the trio 3ballMTY, who specializes in a sound called tribal guarachero. In “Fallen Empires,” Snow Patrol transmits on much the same wavelength as Coldplay and U2.

byline.original: By JON CARAMANICA and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: “Inténtalo” by the trio 3ballMTY, who specializes in a sound called tribal guarachero. In “Fallen Empires,” Snow Patrol transmits on much the same wavelength as Coldplay and U2.

headline.seo: ‘Glory,’ by Jay-Z - Review‘Inténtalo,’ by 3ballMTY - ReviewSnow Patrol’s ‘Fallen Empires’ - Review
headline.main: New Albums by 3ballMTY and Snow Patrol
